content.headline: Built-in Remote Management
content.text: Manage all your company's digital signage devices from one account, no matter the number of devices you have, their brands or locations.

content.headline: Granular User Roles
content.text: Create and customize user roles to manage your team efficiently. This makes work faster and easier while keeping important information safe by controlling who can access it.

content.headline: Cost Savings
